genresAdvancedInfo.name: afrobeat fusion
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Afrobeat fusion is a genre that combines the rhythms and instrumentation of afrobeat with elements of jazz, funk, and world music. It often features complex arrangements and improvisation, as well as socially conscious lyrics that address issues such as political corruption and social inequality.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
